Package model

Interface DriverAI

  • public interface DriverAI
    Interface for writing your own AI for this game. Custom implementations of DriverAI have to be added to the /resources/ai directory.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int[] drive​(int[] carCoordinates, int[] carVelocity, Tile[][] map)
      Is called each turn of the car controlled this AI to determine its next move.
      void init​(Tile[][] map)
      Is called once before the first turn.

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        int[] drive​(int[] carCoordinates,
            int[] carVelocity,
            Tile[][] map)
        Is called each turn of the car controlled this AI to determine its next move. Should return a vector of acceleration of the car for the next turn with two coordinates with values -1 or 0 or 1. If the returned object is of an incorrect format, the next move of the car controlled by this AI will be {0,0}.
        Parameters:
        carCoordinates - the coordinates of the car controlled by this AI.
        carVelocity - the velocity vector of the car controlled by this AI.
        map - the map on which are the cars racing.
        Returns:
        the acceleration vector for the car for the next turn.

      • init

        void init​(Tile[][] map)
        Is called once before the first turn. Does not have to be used.
        Parameters:
        map - the map on which are the cars going to be racing.
